verses.verse: וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> Likewise this [is] the law הָאָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> of the trespass offering קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

בִּמְק֗וֹם <WH4725> In the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> where יִשְׁחֲטוּ֙ <WH7819> where they kill אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣עֹלָ֔ה <WH5930> the burnt offering יִשְׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> shall they kill אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> the trespass offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> דָּמ֛וֹ <WH1818> and the blood יִזְרֹ֥ק <WH2236> thereof shall he sprinkle עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֶלְבּ֖וֹ <WH2459> of it all the fat יַקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> And he shall offer מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at אֵ֚ת <WH853> הָֽאַלְיָ֔ה <WH451> thereof the rump וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> and the fat הַֽמְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> that covereth אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּֽרֶב׃ <WH7130> the inwards

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> And the two הַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙לֶב֙ <WH2459> and the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עֲלֵיהֶ֔ן <WH5921> is on אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַכְּסָלִ֑ים <WH3689> that [is] on them which [is] by the flanks וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיֹּתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3508> and the caul עַל־ <WH5921> on הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> [that is] above the liver עַל־ <WH5921> with הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <WH3629> with the kidneys יְסִירֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5493> it shall he take away

וְהִקְטִ֨יר <WH6999> shall burn אֹתָ֤ם <WH853> הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> And the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> them upon the altar אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> [for] an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אָשָׁ֖ם <WH817> it [is] a trespass offering הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> Every male בַּכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> among the priests יֹאכְלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> shall eat בְּמָק֤וֹם <WH4725> place קָדוֹשׁ֙ <WH6918> in the holy יֵאָכֵ֔ל <WH398> thereof it shall be eaten קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

כַּֽחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> As the sin offering כָּֽאָשָׁ֔ם <WH817> [is] so [is] the trespass offering תּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> law אַחַ֖ת <WH259> [there is] one לָהֶ֑ם הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> for them the priest אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יְכַפֶּר־ <WH3722> that maketh atonement בּ֖וֹ ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> shall have

וְהַ֨כֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> And the priest הַמַּקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> that offereth אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֣לַת <WH5930> burnt offering אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> any man's ע֤וֹר <WH5785> shall have to himself the skin הָֽעֹלָה֙ <WH5930> of the burnt offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִקְרִ֔יב <WH7126> which he hath offered לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> [even] the priest ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> shall have

וְכָל־ <WH3605> every מִנְחָ֗ה <WH4503> And all the meat offering אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> is תֵּֽאָפֶה֙ <WH644> that is baken בַּתַּנּ֔וּר <WH8574> in the oven וְכָל־ <WH3605> and everything נַעֲשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> and all that is dressed בַמַּרְחֶ֖שֶׁת <WH4227> and in the pan וְעַֽל־ <WH5921> in מַחֲבַ֑ת <WH4802> in the fryingpan לַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> shall be the priest's הַמַּקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> that offereth אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> ל֥וֹ תִֽהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> shall belong

וְכָל־ <WH3605> Every מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> And every meat offering בְלוּלָֽה־ <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> with oil וַחֲרֵבָ֑ה <WH2720> and dry לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> shall all the sons אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> of Aaron תִּהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> shall belong אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> have one כְּאָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> [as much] as another פ

וְזֹ֥את <WH2063> likewise תּוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> And this [is] the law זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> which he shall offer לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

אִ֣ם <WH518> If עַל־ <WH5921> way תּוֹדָה֮ <WH8426> it for a thanksgiving יַקְרִיבֶנּוּ֒ <WH7126> If he offer וְהִקְרִ֣יב ׀ <WH7126> then he shall offer עַל־ <WH5921> along זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> with the sacrifice הַתּוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> of thanksgiving חַלּ֤וֹת <WH2471> cakes מַצּוֹת֙ <WH4682> unleavened בְּלוּלֹ֣ת <WH1101> mingled בַּשֶּׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> with oil וּרְקִיקֵ֥י <WH7550> wafers מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> and unleavened מְשֻׁחִ֣ים <WH4886> anointed בַּשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil וְסֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour מֻרְבֶּ֔כֶת <WH7246> fried חַלֹּ֖ת <WH2471> and cakes בְּלוּלֹ֥ת <WH1101> mingled בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <WH8081> with oil

עַל־ <WH5921> with חַלֹּת֙ <WH2471> Besides the cakes לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread חָמֵ֔ץ <WH2557> leavened יַקְרִ֖יב <WH7126> he shall offer קָרְבָּנ֑וֹ <WH7133> [for] his offering עַל־ <WH5921> with זֶ֖בַח <WH2077> with the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֥ת <WH8426> of thanksgiving שְׁלָמָֽיו׃ <WH8002> of his peace offerings

וְהִקְרִ֨יב <WH7126> And of it he shall offer מִמֶּ֤נּוּ <WH4480> at אֶחָד֙ <WH259> one מִכָּל־ <WH3605> of every קָרְבָּ֔ן <WH7133> out of the whole oblation תְּרוּמָ֖ה <WH8641> [for] an heave offering לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> [and] it shall be the priest's הַזֹּרֵ֛ק <WH2236> that sprinkleth אֶת־ <WH853> דַּ֥ם <WH1818> the blood הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> of the peace offerings ל֥וֹ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> shall belong

וּבְשַׂ֗ר <WH1320> And the flesh זֶ֚בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice תּוֹדַ֣ת <WH8426> for thanksgiving שְׁלָמָ֔יו <WH8002> of his peace offerings בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> the same day קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <WH7133> that it is offered יֵאָכֵ֑ל <WH398> shall be eaten לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יַנִּ֥יחַ <WH3240> he shall not leave מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> any עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> any of it until the morning

וְאִם־ <WH518> if נֶ֣דֶר ׀ <WH5088> [be] a vow א֣וֹ <WH176> or נְדָבָ֗ה <WH5071> or a voluntary offering זֶ֚בַח <WH2077> But if the sacrifice קָרְבָּנ֔וֹ <WH7133> of his offering בְּי֛וֹם <WH3117> the same day הַקְרִיב֥וֹ <WH7126> that he offereth אֶת־ <WH853> זִבְח֖וֹ <WH2077> his sacrifice יֵאָכֵ֑ל <WH398> it shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָ֥ר <WH3498> also the remainder מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> of it יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <WH398> of it shall be eaten

וְהַנּוֹתָ֖ר <WH3498> But the remainder מִבְּשַׂ֣ר <WH1320> of the flesh הַזָּ֑בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> on the third בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> with fire יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <WH8313> shall be burnt

וְאִ֣ם <WH518> if הֵאָכֹ֣ל <WH3605> all manner יֵ֠אָכֵל <WH398> be eaten מִבְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> And if [any] of the flesh זֶ֨בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice שְׁלָמָ֜יו <WH8002> of his peace offerings בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֮ <WH7992> on the third לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵרָצֶה֒ <WH7521> it shall not be accepted הַמַּקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> unto him that offereth אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> לֹ֧א <WH3808> it יֵחָשֵׁ֛ב <WH2803> neither shall it be imputed ל֖וֹ פִּגּ֣וּל <WH6292> it it shall be an abomination יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> become וְהַנֶּ֛פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the soul הָאֹכֶ֥לֶת <WH398> at all מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> any עֲוֹנָ֥הּ <WH5771> his iniquity תִּשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> of it shall bear

וְהַבָּשָׂ֞ר <WH1320> And the flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that יִגַּ֤ע <WH5060> that toucheth בְּכָל־ <WH3605> anything טָמֵא֙ <WH2931> any unclean לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵֽאָכֵ֔ל <WH398> [thing] shall not be eaten בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> with fire יִשָּׂרֵ֑ף <WH8313> it shall be burnt וְהַ֨בָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> and as for the flesh כָּל־ <WH3605> anyone טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> all that be clean יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> shall eat בָּשָֽׂר׃ <WH1320> flesh

וְהַנֶּ֜פֶשׁ <WH5315> But the soul אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who תֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> that eateth בָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> [of] the flesh מִזֶּ֤בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִים֙ <WH8002> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that [pertain] unto the LORD וְטֻמְאָת֖וֹ <WH2932> having his uncleanness עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> upon him even that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH5971> from his people

וְנֶ֜פֶשׁ <WH5315> Moreover the soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תִגַּ֣ע <WH5060> that shall touch בְּכָל־ <WH3605> anything טָמֵ֗א <WH2931> or [any] unclean בְּטֻמְאַ֤ת <WH2932> any unclean אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man א֣וֹ ׀ <WH176> or בִּבְהֵמָ֣ה <WH929> beast טְמֵאָ֗ה <WH2931> unclean א֚וֹ <WH176> or בְּכָל־ <WH3605> any שֶׁ֣קֶץ <WH8263> or any abominable טָמֵ֔א <WH2931> unclean וְאָכַ֛ל <WH398> [thing] and eat מִבְּשַׂר־ <WH1320> of the flesh זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which [pertain] unto the LORD וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> even that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH5971> from his people פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כָּל־ <WH3605> any חֵ֜לֶב <WH2459> no manner of fat שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> of ox וְכֶ֛שֶׂב <WH3775> or of sheep וָעֵ֖ז <WH5795> or of goat לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> Ye shall eat

וְחֵ֤לֶב <WH2459> And the fat נְבֵלָה֙ <WH5038> of the beast that dieth of itself וְחֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> and the fat טְרֵפָ֔ה <WH2966> of that which is torn with beasts יֵעָשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> may be used לְכָל־ <WH3605> to any מְלָאכָ֑ה <WH4399> in any other use וְאָכֹ֖ל <WH398> but ye shall in no wise לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <WH398> eat

כִּ֚י <WH3588> For כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever אֹכֵ֣ל <WH398> For whosoever eateth חֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> the fat מִן־ <WH4480> at הַ֨בְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> of the beast אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יַקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> of which men offer מִמֶּ֛נָּה <WH4480> at אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> [it] shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> even the soul הָאֹכֶ֖לֶת <WH398> that eateth מֵֽעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH5971> from his people

וְכָל־ <WH3605> any דָּם֙ <WH1818> no manner of blood לֹ֣א <WH3808> are not תֹאכְל֔וּ <WH398> Moreover ye shall eat בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> any מוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH4186> in any of your dwellings לָע֖וֹף <WH5775> [whether it be] of fowl וְלַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> or of beast

כָּל־ <WH3605> any manner נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> Whatsoever soul אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who תֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> [it be] that eateth כָּל־ <WH3605> any דָּ֑ם <WH1818> of blood וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> even that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מֵֽעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH5971> from his people פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הַמַּקְרִ֞יב <WH7126> He that offereth אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֤בַח <WH2077> the sacrifice שְׁלָמָיו֙ <WH8002> of his peace offerings לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD יָבִ֧יא <WH935> shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנ֛וֹ <WH7133> his oblation לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מִזֶּ֥בַח <WH2077> of the sacrifice שְׁלָמָֽיו׃ <WH8002> of his peace offerings

יָדָ֣יו <WH3027> His own hands תְּבִיאֶ֔ינָה <WH935> shall bring אֵ֖ת <WH853> אִשֵּׁ֣י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֤לֶב <WH2459> the fat עַל־ <WH5921> with הֶֽחָזֶה֙ <WH2373> with the breast יְבִיאֶ֔נּוּ <WH935> it shall he bring אֵ֣ת <WH854> that הֶחָזֶ֗ה <WH2373> that the breast לְהָנִ֥יף <WH5130> may be waved אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהִקְטִ֧יר <WH6999> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> the fat הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> upon the altar וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall belong הֶֽחָזֶ֔ה <WH2373> but the breast לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> shall be Aaron's וּלְבָנָֽיו׃ <WH1121> and his sons'

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַיָּמִ֔ין <WH3225> And the right תִּתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> shall ye give תְרוּמָ֖ה <WH8641> [for] an heave offering לַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> unto the priest מִזִּבְחֵ֖י <WH2077> of the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8002> of your peace offerings

הַמַּקְרִ֞יב <WH7126> that offereth אֶת־ <WH853> דַּ֧ם <WH1818> the blood הַשְּׁלָמִ֛ים <WH8002> of the peace offerings וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> and the fat מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> He among the sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> of Aaron ל֧וֹ תִהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become שׁ֥וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַיָּמִ֖ין <WH3225> shall have the right לְמָנָֽה׃ <WH4490> for [his] part

כִּי֩ <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> חֲזֵ֨ה <WH2373> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֜ה <WH8573> For the wave וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <WH8641> and the heave לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <WH3947> have I taken מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel מִזִּבְחֵ֖י <WH2077> from off the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8002> of their peace offerings וָאֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and have given אֹ֠תָם <WH853> לְאַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> them unto Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <WH3548> the priest וּלְבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> and unto his sons לְחָק־ <WH2706> by a statute עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> for ever מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> from among the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

זֹ֣את <WH2063> is that מִשְׁחַ֤ת <WH4888> This [is the portion] of the anointing אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> of Aaron וּמִשְׁחַ֣ת <WH4888> and of the anointing בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> of his sons מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> in the day הִקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> [when] he presented אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לְכַהֵ֖ן <WH3547> in the priest's office לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> them to minister unto the LORD

אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> These צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Which the LORD לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> to be given לָהֶ֗ם בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> in the day מָשְׁח֣וֹ <WH4886> that he anointed אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> מֵאֵ֖ת <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> them of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> them [by] a statute עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <WH1755> throughout their generations

זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הַתּוֹרָ֗ה <WH8451> This [is] the law לָֽעֹלָה֙ <WH5930> of the burnt offering לַמִּנְחָ֔ה <WH4503> of the meat offering וְלַֽחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> and of the sin offering וְלָאָשָׁ֑ם <WH817> and of the trespass offering וְלַ֨מִּלּוּאִ֔ים <WH4394> and of the consecrations וּלְזֶ֖בַח <WH2077> and of the sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> of the peace offerings

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֧ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount סִינָ֑י <WH5514> Sinai בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> in the day צַוֹּת֜וֹ <WH6680> that he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לְהַקְרִ֧יב <WH7126> to offer אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבְּנֵיהֶ֛ם <WH7133> their oblations לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <WH5514> of Sinai פ
